pages.text: 许多恶魔会提供给凡人签订契约的机会，它们会说，契约必须以血液为证… 这一邪恶的交易将会使得乙方将它的地狱能量注入到甲方之中。名誉，财富，所有的所有...$(br)$(o)墨水对我而言一文不值，$(playername)… 签下你的名字吧

pages.title: Pact: Desiccation
pages.text: You will be able to cast the ability to kill crops to gain strength

pages.title: Pact: Devouring Rage
pages.text: Upon completion, you will be able to heal via killing the living.

pages.title: Pact: Berserker
pages.text: Upon completion, you will be able to deal more damage the lower your health is.

pages.title: Pact: Ignition
pages.text: Upon completion, you will autosmelt ore when mining.

pages.title: Pact: Salamandrine Tolerance
pages.text: Upon completion, you will take less damage from fire.

pages.title: Request: Mahapadma
pages.text: Hold a taglock of the target in your offhand while activating. The target will freeze solid, and splinter into several pieces, killing them.
